Team.name: Brendan
Team.job: Lead Developer, Trippy Artist, Solidity Magician, Fun Dad. First hit the ganja at 15. Avid cannabis grower for over ten years and strain snob. Favorite Strain: 9 lb Hammer.

Team.name: Keith
Team.job: Community Builder, Marketing Guru, Business Development, Existential Thought Leader, Wicked Poet. Started smoking at 16 but did not enjoy it at first... now he can't stop tokin' 24/7!

Team.name: Kim
Team.job: Market Insights, Networking Powerhouse, Twitterspace Butterfly. Puff, puff, pass -- Her favorite way to get baked is a finely rolled RAW joint!

Team.name: Becky
Team.job: Technical & Smart Contract Dev, Animation Lead, Bus Dev & Partnerships. Former cannabis and hemp professional for 8 years. Blazing blunts since 12 years old.

Team.name: Oscar
Team.job: Director of Security, White Hat, Discord Defense, Badass MoFo. Proud Dog Dad. Doesn't smoke weed currently but has a deep appreciation for the science and community.
